titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Edward Husband, printer to the Parliament of England, and are to be sold at his shop in Fleetstreet, at the sign of the Golden-Dragon, near the Inner-Temple,

notesStmt.note: Signatures: 3M-3N⁴ 3O² . Also issued as part of a through-paged set with a table for the entire set added.
On 3M2: last word of first line of text: "and"; first word of line below initial: "in"; last word of last full line: "every".
Ornament on t.p.; initial letter; text in black letter
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library (Thomason Tracts) and the Huntington Library (Early English books).

person.persName: Henrietta Maria, consort of Charles I, King of England, Queen,
